column1: # Proteome Manifest for One-Direction Homolog Search
# proteome_path: Absolute or relative path to the species proteome FASTA file (.aa)
# 1. Copy this file to proteome_manifest.tsv (remove _example suffix)
# 2. Replace example entries with your species
# Or place a proteome_manifest.tsv in INPUT_gigantic/ at the project root
# and it will be automatically copied here at runtime.
